resources.string:
Hi my name is Ernesto Acosta. 

I like to play video games, watch great tv and movies. 

I also enjoy skateboarding, as well as listening and playing great indie, alternative, and rock music. 

I consider myself to be a "jack of all trades", meaning I am not contempt with one thing. 

Not only am I into those things I mentioned above I am also into many other things which include but are not limited to, politics, history, culture, science, geography, astrology, physics, and of course technology. 

Furthermore, I am an atheist, all religion is mostly nonsense, the main one I know a quite a bit about is christianity, but I know quite a bit about norse mythology as well as greek mythology, mainly because they fascinate me. 

I would love to travel one day, mainly to a couple of cool places like big ben in the U.K.. The Eiffel Tower in Paris as well as visit Versailles. The Red Square in Moscow would be amazing to see, as well as the Great Pyramid of Giza, and of course the Great Wall of China. 

Lastly my favorite color is a tie between blue and purple, and I am a huge fan of western european fantasy.
